channel.title: Threatening with Reporting
channel.description:
Is it ok in game to threaten to report people if they take certain actions .
I occasionally get a game where someone will continually command everyone to do what they say or they will report everyone for throwing ..
Example
Scorney McScorneyson says " if you are b d and don't vote execute here I am reporting you for game throwing "
or even
Butler McButlerson says " if you are b d and don't vote execute here I am reporting you for game throwing "
or occasionally
Mastermind McMastermind says " if you are b d and don't vote execute here I am reporting you for game throwing "
Whenever I see this it leaves a bad taste , it seems like meta gaming almost .
Anyway is this alright or not ?

Is it ok to intentionally use the threat of reporting someone as a device to win the game

Doing so should get you reported by everyone in the match.

item.title: Threatening with Reporting
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
It’s not a “reportable offense” to say you’re gonna report someone (just ignore them, if you didn’t do anything wrong you’ll be fine), however if it’s clearly a false report OR if it comes with extra toxicity it will count against them.

item.title: Threatening with Reporting
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
Nope. False reports or threatening false reports will instead result in consequences for the reporter who falsely reported. False reporting or threatening to do so is I believe a reportable offence in itself.
